name: SFW RUNWAY: Creator Awards
content: DRIP GALA" A RUNWAY AND AWARD SHOW Looking to experience the glitz and glamour of the fashion industry up close? Join us at the upcoming Fashion Award Show, where the hottest designers, models, and fashion influencers will gather to celebrate the best in fashion! SFWRUNWAY, our groundbreaking fashion exhibition returns to Los Angeles with Drip Gala a runway and award show celebrating 8 fashion designers and four celebrity stylists. Discover this season's designers while enjoying elements of music, fashion, pop culture, food, innovation, activism right in the heart of LA's Art District . This event is reserved for the most well-dressed influencers, bloggers and industry professionals is also opening its doors to members of Fashion Week online. About Event: SFWRUNWAY returns
